definition: dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: The garnet mineral is regarded as a well- performed natural grinding material.
sentences.chinese: 石榴石礦物是性能優良的天然磨料。

sentences.english: Iron garnets have been applied in magneto-optical inspection sensors.
sentences.chinese: 鐵石榴石已在磁光渦流檢測傳感器上得到應用。

sentences.english: Unlike garnet , it can exactly match the color of a perfect ruby.
sentences.chinese: 與石榴石，它可以完全匹配的顏色完美的紅寶石。

sentences.english: There are two types of garnets found in Mingxi gemstone deposit, Fujian Province.
sentences.chinese: 產於福建明溪的石榴石有兩種類型。

sentences.english: Very rarely, miners unearth red diamonds, which are sometimes mistaken for garnets or rubies.
sentences.chinese: 有時候，礦工會把挖到的紅鑽誤認作石榴石或紅寶石。

sentences.english: There are two types of garnets.
sentences.chinese: 明溪的石榴石有兩種類型。

sentences.english: This paper introduces a sort of low-cost garnet ferrite material.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了一種低成本的石榴石鐵氧體材料。

sentences.english: The garnets of Ji an rock group are characterized by rich iron and are allalmandite.
sentences.chinese: 集安巖羣石榴石以富鐵爲特徵，均屬鐵鋁榴石。

sentences.english: The goal of this study is to explore the method of preparation YAG powder and the fluorescent character.
sentences.chinese: 研究了釔鋁石榴石螢光粉的合成及其發光特性。

sentences.english: The partial melting undergone by plagioclase-peridotite occurred only within spinel or garnet facies.
sentences.chinese: 巖體所曾經受的部分熔融只發生在尖晶石或石榴石相。

sentences.english: Hardness, specific gravity and thermal stability of garnet product.
sentences.chinese: 石榴石產品硬度，比重，熱穩定性測定。

sentences.english: By the examination of XRD, all the peaks are ascribed to the garnet phase.
sentences.chinese: 通過XRD圖譜的檢測，所有衍射峯都指向石榴石相。

definition: citrine (orange or yellow quartz SiO2 as a semiprecious stone)
lapis lazuli (mineral of the square albite family)
